name: glendonTodd Capital
overview: At glendonTodd Capital, they firmly believe that operational insights are key to genuinely understanding the risk profile and the opportunity of any given investment. For this reason, glendonTodd only invests in companies where a member of glendonTodd has operational insight that they believe adds value to the target company. With this thesis, they distinguish themselves from other financial sponsors by providing more than just capital. They seek to collaborate with the management teams of their investments to offer their experience, leadership, values, and insight as resources they can use to accelerate the growth of their company.
